name: Suncream
tagline: The simplest css framework for developing a website.
body:
### **Suncream css framework**
Author : Joonglim,Nam                                          
Description : The best simple css framework for developing website

### How to :
```
1. to download guide-page as index.html.
2. to send parameters into Constructor as A Class name of wrapping element , 
   speed and interval only 3 parameters.
3. to override as adding Functions in Instance , 
   if you are expected to extend for another functionality.
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
